import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import Post from '../components/Post' import { Divider } from '@mui/material' import { UserContext } from '../context/UserContext' import { CityContext } from '../context/CityContext' const ViewPostsPage = () => { const [search, setSearch] = useState('') const { Username, setUsername } = useContext(UserContext) const { City, setCity } = useContext(CityContext) return (
setSearch(e.target.value)}>

({username})

) } export default ViewPostsPage
